17.1.why: Builds a 'this is the correct way to see it' framework and defends mental correctness; that's opinion control and intellectual authority, not liberation of the oppressed or martyr-witness energy (Andromeda).

17.2.why: Quietly spots what's logically off and states the fix as obvious, which is analytical evaluation and standards enforcement, not sovereignty defense or passive victimhood (Andromeda).

17.3.why: Throws opinions into real conditions and refines them as they break, which is experimental logic work, not intervening to stop abuse or collapsing into 'save me' positioning (Andromeda).

17.4.why: Gives the group an organized narrative of 'here’s how to think about this,' which is public opinion-framing and loyalty steering, not sovereignty liberation (Andromeda).

17.5.why: Gets projected on as the logical fixer who should diagnose what's broken and prescribe the system-level answer, which is problem-management authority, not anti-domination defense or martyr witness (Andromeda).

17.6.why: Holds a long-term 'this is the stable, correct way to understand reality' stance and can judge others as childish, which is superiority via intellect, not freeing anyone from exploitation (Andromeda).

18.1.why: Feels what's unhealthy in the structure and pushes to restore integrity rather than tolerate damage, which is defending people from harmful patterns — Andromeda core.

18.2.why: Quietly calibrates and improves what’s broken without making it a fight, which is subtle quality control, not openly confronting domination or falling into martyr 'no one listens to me' pose (Andromeda).

18.3.why: Lives in nonstop troubleshooting and crisis identity — 'everything is broken and someone needs to fix it' — which is externalized blame without direct liberation action, a martyr-critic stance — Andromeda shadow.

18.4.why: Calls out the flaw in the group out loud so the harm can’t be ignored anymore, which is confronting dysfunction to protect collective dignity — Andromeda core.

18.5.why: Gets handed corrupted systems and is expected to repair them for everyone, acting as the one who restores safety and accountability for the tribe — Andromeda core.

18.6.why: Holds a long-arc standard of 'this is healthy, this is not' for the whole timeline, which is long-term guardianship of integrity and refusal to normalize abuse — Andromeda core.

19.1.why: Constantly scans who needs support and panics if basic needs aren't met, which is protect-the-vulnerable nurturing and bonding safety — classic Pleiadian caretaking, not Andromeda liberation/anti-domination.

19.2.why: Creates safe emotional closeness and tends to need without forcing, which is intimate soothing and attachment repair (Pleiades), not sovereignty defense or martyr witness (Andromeda).

19.3.why: Learns boundaries by living messy dependency cycles and emotional ransom loops, which is codependent bonding tension (Pleiades shadow flavor), not breaking oppressive control or passively holding trauma stories (Andromeda).

19.4.why: Names 'this is what we require to feel safe together' and negotiates resources for belonging, which is tribal caregiving logistics, not anti-domination intervention — more Pleiadian than Andromedan.

19.5.why: Gets cast as the one who's supposed to soothe hunger, fear, and loneliness for everyone, which is emotional feeding / nervous system buffering (Pleiades core), not sovereignty liberation (Andromeda).

19.6.why: Embodies 'we keep each other alive through care or we don't survive,' which is collective nurture ethic and moralized bonding — a Pleiadian caretaker archetype, not Andromeda anti-captivity work.

20.1.why: Needs to feel 'I am here now and I'm correct in this moment,' which is self-confirmation in real time, not intervening against abuse or falling into helpless martyr waiting to be saved (Andromeda).

20.2.why: Speaks and acts in clean present-tense authenticity with natural charisma, which is immediate self-expression, not liberation of the exploited or rescue-please passivity (Andromeda).

20.3.why: Figures out truth by improvising under pressure and sometimes detonates trust, which is volatile real-time self-exposure, not sovereignty defense for others or martyr-style 'I'm trapped' narrative (Andromeda).

20.4.why: Becomes the live spokesperson who names 'what is happening right now' for the room, which is real-time translation of the moment, not specifically confronting domination structures (Andromeda).

20.5.why: Is expected to seize command on the spot and act decisively, which is immediate situational authority, not Andromeda liberation or Andromeda shadow martyr-witness energy.

20.6.why: Embodies aligned presence as a lifestyle and can slip into 'I'm awake, you're all asleep' superiority, which is modeled self-awareness, not anti-domination intervention (Andromeda).

21.1.why: Wants clear rules about who controls which resources and why, which is territorial resource governance and power containment — Draco-style access control, not Andromeda sovereignty rescue.

21.2.why: Assumes responsibility for managing assets without oversight and resents being challenged, which is 'I hold the power, trust me' control energy (Draco-coded), not liberation-from-oppression or martyr waiting to be saved (Andromeda).

21.3.why: Pushes authority limits to see how far control can go before trust breaks, which is dominance testing and command calibration, not restoring dignity to the exploited (Andromeda).

21.4.why: Directs resources for tribal survival and uses access as leverage, which is loyalty enforcement and protection-through-control — Draco core — not Andromeda anti-domination ethics.

21.5.why: Is expected to take over and stabilize chaos fast by seizing command, which is emergency authority/containment logic, not sovereignty liberation or martyr witness (Andromeda).

21.6.why: Embodies 'power should secure and protect, not exploit' over time and can still sit above others as the one who knows how control should run, which is ethical dominance framing (Draco stewardship vibe), not Andromeda's break-the-chains activism.

22.1.why: Feels the emotional safety of the room before opening and withholds warmth if it isn't safe, which is relational grace/boundary work and mood gating — Pleiadian-style emotional containment, not Andromeda sovereignty defense.

22.2.why: Radiates inviting warmth and draws people in emotionally without effort, which is soothing social aura and nervous system softening (Pleiades core), not anti-domination confrontation or martyr surrender (Andromeda).

22.3.why: Learns intimacy by oversharing, misreading chemistry, and recovering, which is volatile vulnerability/play with access, not stepping in to defend someone’s sovereignty from oppression (Andromeda).

22.4.why: Curates the emotional atmosphere so the group can relax and connect, which is vibe-hosting / emotional hospitality (Pleiades), not liberation-from-control energy (Andromeda).

22.5.why: Is expected to smooth tension and make everyone feel seen, which is social soothing and relational diplomacy — a caregiving role — not anti-domination intervention or martyr-witness pattern (Andromeda).

22.6.why: Opens emotionally only when it's correct and can carry 'my grace is sacred' distance, which is sovereign timing of vulnerability / devotional elegance, not chain-breaking or passive rescue fantasy (Andromeda).

23.1.why: Waits until the insight is clear enough to express simply, which is internal mental correctness work, not confronting abusive power or holding oppression stories in martyr silence (Andromeda).

23.2.why: Drops a single clean sentence that unlocks complex ideas for others, which is translation of mutation into understandable language, not public defense of someone’s sovereignty (Andromeda).

23.3.why: Finds the right wording by blurting the wrong thing first and dealing with fallout, which is awkward breakthrough via trial, not explicit anti-domination truth-telling or martyr 'please save me' (Andromeda).

23.4.why: Introduces disruptive new knowing in a way the tribe can swallow, which is cultural translation and adaptation, not direct confrontation of oppression for someone's dignity (Andromeda).

23.5.why: Gets pressured to deliver 'the breakthrough' and save everyone with insight on command, which is projected genius/savior-of-logic energy, not specifically breaking abusive control structures (Andromeda).

23.6.why: Becomes the person whose explanation defines the new normal and can drift into 'I see reality, you don't' superiority, which is paradigm articulation, not sovereignty liberation or martyr witness (Andromeda).

24.1.why: Keeps looping inward on a question until it feels resolved, which is private mental integration and obsessive rumination, not anti-domination action or passive 'I'm trapped, rescue me' stance (Andromeda).

24.2.why: Quietly synthesizes disruptive insight alone and resents being forced to explain before it's ready, which is internal processing, not public dignity defense or martyr-witness pattern (Andromeda).

24.3.why: Cycles between clarity and noise while trying to crack the puzzle, which looks unstable to others but is really iterative self-integration, not liberation-of-the-oppressed work (Andromeda).

24.4.why: Turns a personal epiphany into something the group can actually use, which is practical mental synthesis, not stepping in to confront domination or quietly absorbing abuse for others (Andromeda).

24.5.why: Gets treated like the mind-fixer who's supposed to normalize the weird so everyone feels safe, which is reassurance-through-explanation, not sovereignty rescue or martyrdom (Andromeda).

24.6.why: Holds mature understanding of disruptive ideas without panicking and can act like 'you wouldn't get it anyway,' which is intellectual distance, not anti-domination liberation or helpless victim stance (Andromeda).
